attributes.action: launch urgent plans to help British endangered species of animals fight back from extinction.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many British animals are endangered and at risk of extinction, and not enough is done to help them. The Government should work closer with charities to help these animals, and launch programs of it's own, such as more control of precious habitats. It is an urgent matter, and if these animals do not get help, they will be lost forever.
